chapter.title: Layered cake
chapter.simpara: A layered cake is a cake that has two or more layers, usually separated by a filling. Layered cakes are delicious and are very popular at parties. The occasion will determine how you decorate your cake. The are also sometimes substituted for pies in pie fights. In the case, the event is called a cake fight.

chapter.title: Making chocolate cake layers
chapter.simpara: Before you can decorate a cake you must make one or more layers. This procedure show you how to create a two layer chocolate cake.

Bake for 30 minutes or until you can insert a wooden toothpick into the cake and it comes out clean.
Let cool on a wire rack.

chapter.title: Assembling and decorating a chocolate layered cake
chapter.simpara: After you have baked the layers of a cake and made the icing of your choice, use this procedure to assemble and decorate your layered cake.
